name: volume_getValue
description: This function is used to get the volume of a smart home appliance or device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device for which volume is requested is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the air conditioner is located. e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device on which the volume is requested.
